-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ RRExt → c1 ∈ Haus)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ (MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))))=(MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))))

stmt.origin: eqid(cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))

body.origin: |- wceq(cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
body.pretty: ⊢ (MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))))=(MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(c1, cha))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))

comment: The topology of an extension of ` RR ` is Hausdorff. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Sep-2018.)
